methods.name: ForModule
methods.logic: Creates a CompilationEnv object for a given NativeModule.  It extracts the module, enabled features, dynamic tiering setting, fast API targets, and fast API signatures from the NativeModule to initialize the new CompilationEnv.

methods.name: NoModuleAllFeaturesForTesting
methods.logic: Creates a constexpr CompilationEnv object specifically for testing purposes. It initializes the environment with a null module, all WebAssembly features enabled, no dynamic tiering, and null fast API targets and signatures. This setup is ideal for testing scenarios where a complete, feature-rich environment without a specific module context is needed.
